title: Qatar - Credit Rating
description: Standard & Poor's credit rating for Qatar stands at AA with stable outlook. Moody's credit rating for Qatar was last set at Aa3 with positive outlook. Fitch's credit rating for Qatar was last reported at AA- with stable outlook. In general, a credit rating is used by sovereign wealth funds, pension funds and other investors to gauge the credit worthiness of Qatar thus having a big impact on the country's borrowing costs. This page includes the government debt credit rating for Qatar as reported by major credit rating agencies.
